title: Challenges finding information in food and agriculture on the Web: what can we do better?

tasks.task: Attend online agricultural science conference panel discussion focusing on data interoperability and challenges.
subtasks: Greet participants from different time zones.
Introduce panelists and their roles in agricultural data management.
Summarize AgData Commons’ role in metadata curation and access for USDA-funded research.
Highlight challenges in metadata quality and cross-language data integration for AgData Commons.
Explain AGRIS system evolution, multilingual metadata management, and integration challenges.
Discuss Beijing Academy of Agriculture and Forestry Sciences’ experiences with data resource construction and semantic technologies.
Present CGIR’s efforts in big data, FAIR principles, and cross-center data sharing.
Emphasize the importance of controlled vocabularies, metadata standards, and cross-sector collaboration for data accessibility.
Encourage culture change and incentives for researchers to improve data metadata and management practices.
Address challenges in harmonizing metadata across diverse data sources and recommend standardizing practices.
